body.name: Milliard Memory Foam Mattress 10 inch Firm, Bed-in-a-Box | Pressure Relieving, Classic (Full)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 14 - 16. Order within 4 hrs 45 mins.
features: Support – 1” of responsive plush memory foam over a 9“ high density foam base for a super firm and supportive feel.
Unmatched Comfort – Milliard foam is always consistent throughout the mattress with a balanced supportive lift and that does not bottom out.
Convenient - The beautifully designed cover is removable and machine washable for easy care.
Durable - Built to last and made of luxe certified foam that won’t lose its shape, Milliard foam is always consistent throughout the mattress.
Size - Open mattress measures 10”. The mattress ships compressed and rolled. While you can sleep on it immediately, allow up to 72 hours for the mattress to fully expand.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This high loft 10 inch foam mattress features responsive memory foam that contours to your body’s curves over an uber-thick supportive base for comfortable and total body support. The memory foam is designed for pressure relief, while ensuring proper spinal alignment. Even light sleepers will fly straight into dreamland without creaky springs that easily transfer your partner’s motion. The mattress is also naturally hypoallergenic so you can rest in the knowledge that you are in a safe sleep environment. You can rest assured that this Foam has been tested and is not made with any Cfc's, ozone depleters, or Pbde flame retardants, or any lead, mercury, or heavy metals, or formaldehyde, or prohibited phthalates, and has Low Voc emissions to make sure it doesn't affect your indoor air quality or your health. Our beautifully designed and super soft cover is machine washable and features a non slip bottom. The cover is stretchy, contouring along with the memory foam, so you can feel the full comfort of your mattress. An inner cotton rib cover provides chemical- and fiberglass- free fire safety so you can sleep safe and sound. While the bed frame/foundation is not included, the mattress can accommodate most sleeping surfaces including an adjustable bed base.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Since I'm 6'1" (~186cm) tall, I ordered a Full XL-sized bed frame. It was difficult to find a Full XL mattress that met my needs, so I settled on this Milliard Full size. It seems to be about 3" longer than a standard Full size, which is actually perfect for my needs.For context, I was sleeping on a spring mattress before this. It was great, until the springs started stabbing out from the mattress' surface. I ended up using my Milliard futon sofa mattress on my bed frame while waiting to order something new, and found it was really comfortable! The futon version is 6" thick, and I could feel the bed frame's bars through it just a little bit, but that's not a problem at all with the 10" mattress shown on this store page.It's very firm, but not hard. I was able to sleep splendidly after just 8 hours of expansion time, but it may take up to 72 hours to reach its full potential. When I woke up in the morning, I noticed that the mattress corners had continued to rise and properly square-up as I slept.Age, work, and health factors have teamed up to trouble me with acute back pains. After one night sleeping on this wonderful mattress, I already feel a substantial decrease in such pains. I really hope this effect continues.Normally, when I get in bed, I spend a little time reflecting on the day and thinking about what I have to do the next day, but on this mattress I fell asleep before I could begin ruminating, and woke up feeling energetic and focused. What a treat it is to wake up feeling ready for work, instead of dreading getting up.A major, MAJOR feature I love about this mattress is not sinking into it. This means I can roll over easily and not overheat. I've had a lot of problems along those lines with previous memory foam mattresses, but not with this one!I'm also very pleased with the price. I spent a few days sleeping on a $1000+ Purple mattress with similar properties, which I feel are met or exceeded by this Milliard bed, which I spent $270 on. If Milliard can keep it's quality this high and prices this low, I'll become a lifelong customer. That may sound like I'm overstating things, but we need comfortable shoes, nutritious food, and good beds to do our best each day. Milliard has the bed part covered!To suit my personal sense of comfort, I augmented my mattress with two of the following Bamboo-brand toppers, to help further dissipate heat and to simulate the feel of a pillowtop-style mattress. I also layered three of these toppers on my Milliard futon sofa mattress to give it a super-plump & cozy feel. Your preferences may vary.https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0831L9J53?psc=1&ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_product_details

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with the mattress - this is the second one we’ve bought. It’s nice and firm which we like. Very comfortable. Takes a day or two to reach full size after unwrapping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought a second one
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a different size for our guest bedroom. It was so fabulous I had to get one for me and my husbands room too!!! Really love how firm and comfortable it is. I def recommend and we had a temperpedic before, albeit was a much older used one donated to us by my dad so it was due to be replaced even though orig it was extremely expensive and was labeled as firm it didn’t last as long as expected. Bring it was a high end brand. So it really surprised me something less expensive would be this comfortable. I’m super happy about our purchases and definitely highly recommended if you’re in the market for a new mattress. A+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this since the end of July, so it’s been a couple months of continuous use. When I first got this, it was easy to “install” and boom, I have a new mattress. I loved it, it was firm and affordable!However, since I sleep in the middle of the bed, the middle has a dip that really makes it hard to sleep. I thought it would’ve last longer than 3months based on the reviews and their advertisement but now I’m dealing with a dipped bed.Given the Price , it wasn’t too bad but I should’ve known that it was “too good to be true” I guess. Sucks that it has a dip in it. And yes, I have slept on different areas of the bed to kinda reduce the dip but it didn’t work. So now I’m on the hunt for a new mattress.4 starts cuz of the price, and comfort. The durability could be better but I guess you get what you paid for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Delivered quicker than stated which was great. Easy to open and set up. Nice product and it is firm. I had this mattress in a twin and it held up great so I ordered a queen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Firm Mattress
reviews.reviewText: We really loved this mattress. It’s the best firm mattress that I have ever seen and the width of the mattress is so good. I started using this during my sick time and this mattress helped me with back issues. I would highly recommend this mattress

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality, firm, long lasting
reviews.reviewText: I use it in my campervan. Best sleep I ever had. After nearly a year it still feels like brand new.I do use a mattress cover with a little padding that gives it a little give, which is perfect.A big plus for ne was absolutely no chemical smell after letting it air out for day outside.Highly recommend if you like a firm mattress

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Firm yet gentle
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to use at the fire station over others that were comparable in price because the lesser star reviews said it was too firm. I'm 5'8 200 lbs and didn't sink down like have in other memory foam mattresses but it still is soft enough to cradle. Only had it for a few nights but so far its been far better than I expected, as at home I sleep on a purple matress.
